abstract: The investor Carl C. Icahn has gone shopping again, this time acquiring shares in the retailer J. C. Penney, people briefed on the matter said Friday.
snippet: The investor Carl C. Icahn has gone shopping again, this time acquiring shares in the retailer J. C. Penney, people briefed on the matter said Friday.
lead_paragraph: The investor Carl C. Icahn has gone shopping again, this time acquiring shares in the retailer J. C. Penney, people briefed on the matter said Friday. The size of the stake could not be learned.

headline.main: Icahn Is Said to Buy Stake in Penney
headline.print_headline: Icahn Is Said To Buy Stake In Penney

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
